Dialogue: This place… Is there a way out…?
There has to be… how else am I here?
... I can’t remember… it’s all fuzzy…
Okay, okay, deep breaths… er…
Right, right… My name, it’s…
Why… why can’t I remember my own name…?
I… have to get out of here first. I can worry about it later…
Im not sure why but for some reason I remember Q and E
A monster...?
This place is a mess, but at least there’s no monsters in here.
Huh?
Is that… a merchant?

Is this a barrel?
What is it doing here?
Oh, it looks terrible. Well, at least I know why it’s in here.
A sword?
I suppose I’ll use it.
Still as beaten up as ever. It’s probably seen better days.
Now what did the cat drag in?
I didn’t expect someone like you ‘round here.
You look matted and stuff. Tough day?

Choice: A really tough day. I could use some gear.

Completely terrible! I don’t remember a thing about myself,
I’m in here for some reason, and everything smells awful. So yes, terrible.

Branches: I can see it kitty. Wanna see what I have?
I don’t need everything about ya!
Look, let’s just get down to business, alright?

Dialogue: A skeleton?
Stars!
I better get out of here soon. I don’t want to end up like that.
There’s nothing of use on the skeleton. I better get moving.
